titles.title: A Charge to Keep I Have

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A charge to keep I have, A God to glorify; A never-dying soul to save, And fit it for the sky.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To serve the present age, My calling to fulfill; O may it all my pow'rs engage, To do my Master's will!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Arm me with watchful care As in Thy sight to live, And O, Thy servant, Lord, prepare A strict account to give!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Help me to watch and pray, And on Thyself rely, Assured, if I my trust betray, I shall forever die.
